get.summary: Get the current version of the named spec
get.description: Get the current version of the named spec

get.summary: List all the versions of the named spec
get.description: List all the versions of the named spec

get.summary: Get a specific verison of the named spec
get.description: Get a specific verison of the named spec

404.description: Spec or spec version not found

get.summary: List stored evaluation results for the given spec version
get.description: List stored evaluation results for the given spec version

404.description: Spec or spec version not found

get.summary: Get the contents of the given timelines as a graph, grouped by event attrbutes.
get.description:
Get the contents of the given timelines as a graph, grouped by event attrbutes.

If no keys are specified using the 'group_by' query parameter,
the graph is grouped by event.name.

get.summary: Get the contents of the workspace as a graph, grouped by event attrbutes.
get.description:
Get the contents of the workspace as a graph, grouped by event attrbutes.

If no keys are specified using the 'group_by' query parameter,
the graph is grouped by (timeline.name, event.name).

get.summary: Get the contents of the segment as a graph, grouped by event attrbutes.
get.description:
Get the contents of the segment as a graph, grouped by event attrbutes.

If no keys are specified using the 'group_by' query parameter,
the graph is grouped by (timeline.name, event.name).

get.summary: List all timelines in a specific segment
get.description: List all timelines in a specific segment

GroupedGraph.description: A graph created by grouping together events by their attribute values.

attr_keys.description: The grouping keys used to compute this graph

edges.description: The edges in the graph; node indices in this collection refer to `nodes`.

count.description: How many times did this particular transition occur?

destination.description: Corresponds to a position in the `GroupedGraph.nodes` array

source.description: Corresponds to a position in the `GroupedGraph.nodes` array

attr_vals.description:
These are the values for this node corresponding to the `attr_keys`
of the parent `GroupedGraph`

count.description: How many times did events of this group occur?

WorkspaceSegmentId.description: A specific segment of a workspace.

WorkspaceSegmentMetadata.description: A specific segment of a workspace.
